Don't use this app. They harrass people and threaten to inform all your contacts to pay the loan. They should be reported and close down their operations for good. I have personal experience with their agent. If I received another call from them or text about their promotion. I will report them to NBI
mabayaran lang kita di nako uutang. wanya mo interest rate mo 95%. imagine nag loan ako ng 5 terms P1,200 tapos everyweek need ko mag pay ng 468 pesos? P2,340 babayaran ko? scam na yun e

in times of cash shortage yes this app helped me but the interest is very high for 2 weeks your 1000 has 440 interest or 720 per week. not a good lending app better look for other apps. the agent also harassed me and gave only 1 hour to pay he called me 1 pm and giving up to 2pm to pay since it's my due date. dapat pwede upto 5pm or 11pm coz it's still within the due date. then many numbers keep on texting me offering loans after I got this loan,your number will be compromised so don't trust dis

Feels like a sharkloan app. I'm greatly disappointed that it shared my contact information and now I keep receiving spam calls and messages even after I'm fully paid. Also, the interest is almost 50% of the principal amount, the dates set to pay are 3 times a month. This app even reminds you to pay even 3 days earlier, while it is good, there are calls and text messages as if I'm going to refuse to pay. It irked the hell out of me. Not as safe and convenient as the other app nor it is helpful.
easy to fill up and maybe it easy to release to I am waiting to my loan thank you

For awareness. MocaMoca's operator, Copperstone Lending Inc., is currently considered an illegal lending operation because its license to operate was revoked by the Philippine Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in April 2024. Revoked SEC Registration: The SEC revoked the license of MocaMoca (operated by Copperstone Lending, Inc.) on April 11, 2023, due to numerous complaints and violations of the Prohibition on Unfair Debt Collection Practices and the Truth in Lending Act.
first time to use moca. a reliable and trustworthy lending app

The application steps are clear and easy to understand, making it very convenient and effortless to use. Approval is fast, disbursement is rapid, loan amounts are flexible, interest rates are reasonable and transparent with no hidden fees, repayment methods are diverse, and the platform is safe and reliable.
